settings.name: Name of Your Extension
settings.description: This will be used as the name of your extension by the rest of the project
settings.placeHolder: A short name for your extension

settings.name: Log Header
settings.description: Combined with a colon, log messages in the console will use this header

settings.name: Internal Log Header
settings.description: Combined with a colon, log messages in the console will use this header

settings.name: Image Title
settings.description: The text that appears when the image is hovered over

settings.name: Image Path
settings.description: The path for your popup page topmost image, /icons/logo.svg is default

settings.name: Image Alt
settings.description: A description of your image that explains what it is if it fails to load

settings.name: Primary
settings.description: Use a 3 or 6 digit hexcode color value

settings.name: Primary (Light)
settings.description: Use a 3 or 6 digit hexcode color value

settings.name: Primary (Dark)
settings.description: Use a 3 or 6 digit hexcode color value

settings.name: Header Message
settings.description: This is the text above the next provided links

settings.name: Footer Message
settings.description: The small text at the bottommost part of the page

settings.name: Empty Message
settings.description: This should not be here in release
